India, Bangladesh sign seven pacts after Modi-Hasina talks One of the projects included import of LPG (Liquefied Petroleum Gas) from Bangladesh for distribution in the North Eastern states.

Sedition slapped on celebs who wrote to PM on lynchings A first information report (FIR) was filed on Thursday in Muzaffarpur, Bihar, against around 50 eminent people for writing an open letter to Prime Minister Narendra Modi raising their concern over the increasing incidents of lynching.
